overview:
Bryan Lhuillier was the founder of whohasit.com in 1994, an early online marketplace and search engine for architectural commodities, antiques, and collectibles.

Though the late 1990’s, Bryan consulted and held various roles at Microsoft and a few early stage technology companies developing digital media, internet, and e911-based mobile location services. In 2002, Bryan created the Servola application framework and in 2005, founded Coverage Systems, an online workforce management application service for the healthcare staffing industry. In 2005, Bryan founded Shiftboard.com, an online workforce scheduling and management SaaS business where he currently serves as board member and Chief Product and Technology Officer.
